name: DeDrive
description: A fun single and multiplayer game by playing with friends short and crisp round. Building a lobby is very simple and every little one would make it. Control is also very simple and does not have to be practiced for long.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit Processor: AMD Athlon 64 3700 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 220 DirectX: Version 9.0 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i5 6500 Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon(TM) R3 Graphics DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space
